description.value:
Access Matanji ethnicity

Frequency once per minute

Trigger You successfully Strike a living creature that has the fiend trait with your tusks unarmed attack.

Just the taste of fiendish blood is enough to send blood rushing through your veins in a supernatural fury. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened] until the end of your next turn and you can use the extra action to make a tusks Strike, Stride, or Step.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
